data.title: Hotels and More: Centre
data.meta_description: Logis de la Paqueraie is located a 35-minute drive from the center of Tours, and offers rooms in a cottage featuring views of the surrounding countryside. The property is set in a private park and has a garden with a heated outdoor swimming pool. Each individually decorated room includes a TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. A continen...
data.text:
Logis de la Paqueraie

Logis de la Paqueraie is located a 35-minute drive from the center of Tours, and offers rooms in a cottage featuring views of the surrounding countryside. The property is set in a private park and has a garden with a heated outdoor swimming pool. Each individually decorated room includes a TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. A continen...

See details

Chambres d'Hôtes La Turone

La Turone is a B&B set in a 19th-century farmhouse with a tree-lined garden, just 10 minutes from both the Château d'Azay-le-Rideau and the Château de Langeais. Fresh homemade bread is served for breakfast, and you can enjoy an aperitif on the terrace. With a private entrance, the guest room is decorated in a traditional style with wooden furnitu...

See details

Bed and Breakfast - Château du Vau

Located 6.2 mi from Tours, in a 128-hectare landscaped domain, Château du Vau offers an outdoor swimming pool, heated until mid-October, and free Wi-Fi access throughout the property. There is also a farm with farm animals on site, and wild animals can be seen in the park. With antique furnishing, the rooms at Château du Vau feature a view of the...

See details

Domaine Beauséjour

Domaine Beausejour is located in Panzoult, among the vineyards of the Loire Valley. Guests are invited to stroll among the grapevines or swim in the outdoor pool. On-site visits of the wine cellars and wine tasting sessions can be arranged and guests will be introduced to Chinon wines during the tasting. Free WiFi is available. Domaine Beauséjour ...

See details

Le cheval bleu

4.2 miles from Parc des Expositions Tours in Larçay, Le cheval bleu offers accommodations with access to spa facilities. With garden views, this accommodation features a swimming pool. There's a sun terrace and guests can use free Wifi and free private parking. There is a seating area, a dining area, and a kitchen complete with an oven, a microwav...

See details

Le Clos de La Rousselière B and B

Housed in a historic building, the recently renovated Le Clos de La Rousselière B and B provides accommodations with massage services and free Wifi. The air-conditioned accommodations are 1.7 miles from Château de Chenonceau. The bed and breakfast features parking on-site, an outdoor swimming pool, and full-day security. Every unit includes a pri...

See details

Moulin de la Chevriere

Offering a south-facing terrace and hot tub, Moulin de la Chevriere is located in Saché in the Center Region, 11 mi from Tours and a 10-minute drive from the Château d'Azay-le-Rideau. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Some units have a seating area where you can relax. Enjoy a cup of c...

See details

La clé des jardins

Located in Nouâtre, just a 30-minute drive from Tours, La Ferme du Temple offers a garden, a terrace and a pond with ducks. The River Vienne is a 2-minute walk away and Château de Villandry is a 40-minute drive from the property. All rooms feature a garden view and wardrobe. The private bathroom includes a bathtub or shower, free toiletries and h...

See details

Manoir des Bertinières

Featuring free WiFi and a terrace, Manoir des Bertinières offers accommodations in Cravant-les-Coteaux. Free private parking is available on site. Rooms come with a flat-screen TV. Every room comes with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. Continental breakfast is served every morning. Evening meals ...

See details

Domaine de la Maison Neuve

Set in a 19th-century former farm on a 1-hectare garden, Domaine de la Maison Neuve is located in Saint-Jean-Saint-Germain. Guests can relax in the common living area with a flat-screen TV and DVD player. The rooms at Domaine de la Maison Neuve are individually decorated and feature exposed-stone walls. Each room is equipped with free Wi-Fi and a p...

See details
